alert.note: Alert for Hansford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 22 at 3:50PM CDT until June 23 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Texas... Palo Duro Creek at Spearman 6W affecting Hansford County. For the Palo Duro Creek...including Spearman 6W...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Palo Duro Creek at Spearman 6W. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, The creek is at bankfull stage. Some minor overbank flooding occurs and cattle in the floodplain may be threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.5 feet this evening. - Action stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 400 AM CDT.
